schema.description:
Upload Valid consent doc in pdf format.
Max size=100MB.

parameters.name: fanId
parameters.description: GM fanId. Required only if GM VINs will be enrolled in fleet. Otherwise not needed.

put.description: This API can be used to update fanID which is required in case GM VINs will be enrolled in fleet.

value.action: Blue Button Key Press, ask for a fleet advisor and request a reactivation

get.description: This API can be used to check if VIN is supported or not.

get.summary: Get All Eligibility Check Report Ids

details.action: Blue Button Key Press, ask for a fleet advisor and request a reactivation

get.description: Returns All cxPackage that is enabled for Fleet Partner. VIN can be enrolled in any of cxPackage returned by this api.

post.description: This API is used to enroll VINs.

get.description: This API returns enrollment status of a VIN.

delete.description: This API is used to unenroll VIN.

severity.description:
LOW - low impact collision, airbag not deployed.
HIGH - high impact collision, airbag deployed.
NA - Not Available.

heading.description:
unit - decimal degrees.
North is zero degree.
Vehicle has positive heading in counter-clockwise direction and negative value in clockwise direction.

frontLeft.description: Front left Tire pressure in psi.

frontRight.description: Front right Tire pressure in psi.

rearLeft.description: Rear left Tire pressure in psi.

rearRight.description: Rear right Tire pressure in psi.

value.description: Represents speed in miles per hour.

unit.description: unit = mph i.e. miles per hour.

fleetId.description: id of Fleet in which VIN will be enrolled.

cxPackageName.description: CxPackage in which VIN will be enrolled. e.g "BASIC", "ADVANCED", "PREMIUM" etc.

vin.description:
17 digit unique vehicle identifier.
e.g. '1GCZGTCB2E1122426' is valid Stellantis chevrolet Express vin.

code.description:
code=200, if operation successful.
code-422, if operation unsuccessful.

cxPackageName.description: CxPackage name in which VIN is enrolled.

referenceId.description:
unique string id generated per enrollment request.
It is used for further debugging/communication purposed in case operation failed.

vin.description:
17 digit unique vehicle identifier. 
same as sent in request.

status.description:
INVALID - VIN is not valid.
NOT_CONNECTED - VIN is valid but not connected.
NOT_ELIGIBLE - VIN is connected but not eligible.
NOT_READY - VIN is eligible but not ready for enrollment.
READY - VIN is ready for enrollment.

cxMake.description: Make mapped to cxMake supported by CerebrumX.

status.description:
Represent current status of VIN Enrollment
PENDING - Enroll Request Accepted, waiting for activation from OEM side.
FAILED - Enroll Request Rejected.
ACTIVE - VIN is 'ACTIVE', OEM accepted enroll request. Data will be received as vehicle moves.
DEACTIVATION_PENDING - UnEnroll request Accepted, waiting for unENroll from OEM side.
DEACTIVATION_FAILED - UnEnroll request failed, retry after sometime.

cxPackageName.description: CxPackage Name will was enrolled in.

fleetStatus.description:
Represents fleet Status.
PENDING - Fleet is pending for validation & activation.
ACTIVE - Fleet validation & activation successful.
FAILED - Fleet activation failed. 'Create Fleet' requested was rejected.

VINs can be enrolled only against 'ACTIVE' fleet.

name.description: OEM name, consent is being referred to

cxPackageList.description:
Package enabled for partner.
All the VINs will be enrolled in this package.

harshBrakeRateLimit.description: Harsh Brake Rate Limit in meter per second square.

rapidAccRateLimit.description: Rapid Acceleration Rate Limit in meter per second square.

sharpTurnsRateLimit.description: Sharp Turns Rate Limit in meter per second square.

vin.description:
17 digit unique vehicle identifier. 
same as sent in request.

count.description:
VIN count( value greater than 1 represents vin was repeated multiple times).
count=3 means, same VIN was present 3 times in request

status.description:
INVALID - VIN is not valid.
NOT_CONNECTED - VIN is valid but not connected.
NOT_ELIGIBLE - VIN is connected but not eligible.
NOT_READY - VIN is eligible but not ready for enrollment.
READY - VIN is ready for enrollment.

cxMake.description: Make mapped to cxMake supported by CerebrumX.

name.description: user freindly name to remember/distinguish a particular report.

vinList.description: List of VINs to Check VIN Eligibility.

reportStatus.description:
Report Generation status.
IN_PROCESSING - Report generation in progress.
COMPLETED - Report generation completed.

cxPackageName.description:
cxPackage name device will be registered into
e.g. BASIC, ADVANCED, PREMIUM

fleetId.description: Id of Fleet device will be registered in.

regStatus.description:
REG_PENDING
 - Dongle device registration request has been verified and accepted
 - Dongle device provisioning is initiated 
REGISTERED
 - Dongle device provisioning is complete and the device is ready for data collection
REG_FAILED
 - Dongle device registration could not be completed successfully.
DEREG_PENDING
 - Request to unregister the dongle device has been accepted and is currently in process
DEREG_FAILED
 - Deregistration of the dongle device could not be completed successfully.
DEREGISTERED
 - Dongle device deregistration request is successful and dongle has been disabled for data collection.

DEREGISTERED
